 2010-04812010-04-22,  ,  ,  ,  ,  FIN
ActCanadian International Trade Tribunal Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canadian International Trade Tribunal Procurement Inquiry Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADIAN INTERNATIONAL TRADE TRIBUNAL PROCUREMENT INQUIRY REGULATIONS in order to implement certain povisions of the Agreement between the Government of Canada and the Government of the United States of America on Government Procurement, which came into force on February 16, 2010.
